headerText: Textarea components are used for collecting large amounts of textual data.

usage.desc: `v-textarea` in it's simplest form is a multi-line text-field, useful for larger amounts of text.

icon.desc: The `append-icon` and `prepend-icon` props help add context to `v-textarea`.

auto-grow.desc: When using the `auto-grow` prop, textarea's will automatically increase in size when the contained text exceeds it's size.

background-color.desc: The `background-color` and `color` props give you more control over styling `v-textarea`'s.

browser-autocomplete.desc: The `autocomplete` prop gives you the option to enable the browser to predict user input.

clearable.desc: You can clear the text from a `v-textarea` by using the `clearable` prop, and customize the icon used with the `clearable-icon` prop.

counter.desc: The `counter` prop informs the user of a character limit for the `v-textarea`.

no-resize.desc: `v-textarea`'s have the option to remain the same size regardless of their content's size, using the `no-resize` prop.

rows.desc: The `rows` prop allows you to define how many rows the textarea has, when combined with the `row-height` prop you can further customize your rows by defining their height.

signup-box.desc: Utilizing alternative input styles, you can create amazing interfaces that are easy to build and easy to use.

props.autoGrow: Automatically grow the textarea depending on amount of text
props.rowHeight: Height value for each row. Requires the use of the **auto-grow** prop.

slots.append-outer: Appends an item inside input content
slots.prepend-inner: Prepends an item inside input content

events.keydown: Emitted when **any** key is pressed, textarea must be focused
